name: International Meat Trade Association
membership: UECBV Union Europeenne du Commerce du Betail et de la Viande
goal: To represent particularly UK importers and exporters of meat with regard to EU policy and to aim to promote the need for international trade for the future benefit of all.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Borders and Security, Business and Industry, Consumers, Customs, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Enlargement, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, Fraud prevention, International co-operation and development, Single market, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: Free Trade Negotiations, import and export policy, food hygiene and animal health policies
